T03D3814:9b-33: yin par blta'o // dus gcig na zhes bya ba
T03D3814:9b-34: la sogs pas ni skabs 'byed par byed pa rtsom
T03D3814:9b-35: yin par blta'o // pa yin no // dus ni ston pa la sogs pa'i dus so //
T03D3814:9b-36: bdud bzhi bcom bas na bcom ldan 'das te /
T03D3814:9b-37: yon tan rin po che'i phung po mtha' med pa can 'gro ba'i bla ma la bya'o //
T03D3814:9b-38: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i tshig gis brjod pa
T03D3814:9b-39: ni rang dang gzhan gyi don du zhugs pa'i 'khor
T03D3814:10a-1: cig char skyabs su 'os pa nyid yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:10a-2: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
T03D3814:10a-3: gyi kun dga' ra ba na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
T03D3814:10a-4: pas ni gnas de mchod rten du gyur pa dang
T03D3814:10a-5: mes 'jig pa la sogs pas mi shigs par yang
T03D3814:10a-6: bstan te / sa phyogs de ni skyon thams cad
T03D3814:10a-7: las grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis byung
T03D3814:10a-8: bstan te / ba'i phyir ro // de bzhin gshegs
T03D3814:10a-9: pa'i spyod lam bzhi po gang yang rung bas bzhugs
T03D3814:10a-10: pa'i sa phyogs de ni me la sogs pa'i 'jig
T03D3814:10a-11: pa rnams kyis shigs par mi 'gyur ro//
T03D3814:10a-12: zhes byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:10a-13: de ltar byas na zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las /
T03D3814:10a-14: rgyal po'i khab kyi shar phyogs 'di nyid du //
T03D3814:10a-15: sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag mthong ba dang //
T03D3814:10a-16: rgyal ba de dag kun gyi drung du ni //
T03D3814:10a-17: ting 'dzin zhi ba mchog 'di zhu ba bgyis //
T03D3814:10a-19: blo gros shin tu brtan pas zhus pa las kyang /
T03D3814:10a-20: byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sangs rgyas
T03D3814:10a-21: bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhis
T03D3814:10a-22: sa phyogs 'di nyid du gsungs so //
T03D3814:10a-23: zhes bya ba dag dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro //
T03D3814:10a-24: bzhugs so zhes bya ba ni spyod pa khyad par
T03D3814:10a-25: can dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go
T03D3814:10a-26: // bzhugs pa'i tshig gis ni lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan te /
T03D3814:10a-27: rgyal byed kyi tshal la sogs pa na sems can
T03D3814:10a-28: gyi don mchog tu mdzad cing bcom ldan 'das de
T03D3814:10a-29: ljongs rgyu ba bzhin du bzhugs pa yin gyi /
T03D3814:10a-30: dus bzla ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3814:10a-31: de nyid kyi phyir dus gcig na zhes gsungs te /
T03D3814:10a-32: gzhan na ni yul gzhan dag na bzhugs par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:10a-33: 'dis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su slob pa
T03D3814:10a-34: gdul bya rnams kyis kyang gnas pa mchog gsum gyis
T03D3814:10a-35: gnas par bya ba yin gyi 'jim gong bzhin du
T03D3814:10a-36: 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bstan to //
T03D3814:10a-37: gzhan dag na re dus gcig na zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang sbyar ba yin te /
T03D3814:10a-38: bdag rang la skad cig ma gcig la snang ba yin no zhes zer te /
T03D3814:10b-0: de ni gcig tu nges @10b par dgongs pa yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3814:10b-1: de'i bdag rang la snang ba ni 'khor rnams 'dri bar mi 'dod kyi /
T03D3814:10b-2: dpal gyi mgur nas gsungs pa 'dri bar bsams pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:10b-3: gang yang rang tshang mar grub par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3814:10b-4: yul dang dus ni gtan tshigs /
T03D3814:10b-6: rtsod pa'i dbang rgya dang tshul 'dra'o zhes smra na /
T03D3814:10b-7: de ni bdag gis rtogs pa ma yin te /
T03D3814:10b-8: 'di ltar yul thog thag tu song zhing dbang la
T03D3814:10b-9: dri bar bya ba ni der 'gro mi nus pa
T03D3814:10b-10: rnams kyis mdo sde'i don gtan la dbab pa ring
T03D3814:10b-12: gang du 'khor gyi ming ma bstan pa der yang su la dri bar bya /
T03D3814:10b-13: da ni bstan pa'i nang du gtogs pa'i 'khor gang yin pa'i dbang du byas nas de ni /
T03D3814:10b-14: dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
T03D3814:10b-15: chen po dang thabs cig tu zhes bya ba la
T03D3814:10b-17: 'dir yang dge slong gi 'khor sngar bstan pa ni chung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:10b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phyis bstan pa ni che ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:10b-19: dper na 'gro ba kun dang slob pa dang mi
T03D3814:10b-20: slob pa dang rang rgyal rnams zhes bya ba la
T03D3814:10b-21: sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no //
T03D3814:10b-22: gzhan dag na re 'khor rtag pa yin pa'i phyir
T03D3814:10b-23: dge slong gi 'khor sngar smos so zhes zer ro
T03D3814:10b-24: // nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i phyir dge slong ngo //
T03D3814:10b-25: nyon mongs pa tsam zad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs
T03D3814:10b-26: pa gang yin pa de dag nyan thos kyi theg
T03D3814:10b-27: pa'i nang du gtogs pa yin gyi /
T03D3814:10b-28: theg pa chen po'i nang du ma gtogs pa yin nam /
T03D3814:10b-29: bdun brgya pa 'di ni theg pa chen po shin
T03D3814:10b-30: tu bsdus pa gcig tu nges pa'i don mchog tu
T03D3814:10b-31: zad pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can
T03D3814:10b-32: dag las gzhan pa nyan thos la sogs pa dag
T03D3814:10b-34: gang gis na nyan thos kyi 'khor bstan ce na de ni nyes pa med de /
T03D3814:10b-35: don 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3814:10b-36: pa nyi khri lnga stong pa las byams pas zhus
T03D3814:10b-37: nas de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa /
T03D3814:10b-38: sems can rnams kyi rigs ni gsum mo //
T03D3814:10b-39: de la sems can gyi rigs kha cig ni thog
T03D3814:10b-40: mar rgya che ba dam pa tshol bar byed la
T03D3814:10b-41: rgya che ba nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro
T03D3814:11a-0: // kha cig ni thog mar dman pa tshol @11a * //
T03D3814:11a-1: la dman pa nyid khong du chud pa'o //
T03D3814:11a-2: de tsam gyis mgu ba yang ma yin te /
T03D3814:11a-3: yang mchog rgya che ba tshol zhing de yang khong du chud do //
T03D3814:11a-4: kha cig ni dman pa kho na tshol zhing dman pa khong du chud de /
T03D3814:11a-5: de tsam gyis mgu nas gang ma mchog rgya chen
T03D3814:11a-6: po tshol bar mi byed pa de ni zhi ba
T03D3814:11a-7: phyogs gcig la zhugs par bstan to //
T03D3814:11a-8: gang dag nyan thos kyi byang chub thob kyang de
T03D3814:11a-9: tsam gyis mgu ba ma yin gyi bla na med
T03D3814:11a-10: pa yang dag pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par
T03D3814:11a-11: byed cing / las dang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du
T03D3814:11a-12: ma gyur par byang chub tu yongs su sgyur bar
T03D3814:11a-13: byed cing / byed la ; smon lam gyi dbang gis skye ba gzhan dang gzhan bsgrubs te /
T03D3814:11a-14: byang chub tu tshogs rdzogs par byed do //
T03D3814:11a-15: de nyan thos kyi rigs can du bstan pa ni thog mar de'i byang chub tshol ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:11a-16: dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las kyang nga ni
T03D3814:11a-17: rnam grangs kyis de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
T03D3814:11a-18: can du smra'o zhes bka' stsal to //
T03D3814:11a-19: sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa yang de lta bu yin par blta'o //
T03D3814:11a-20: des na de dag 'di nyan pa la sogs pa'i snod nyid yin no //
T03D3814:11a-21: byang chub la 'am byang chub nyid sems pa yin pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3814:11a-22: sems che ba nyid dang spong ba che ba nyid
T03D3814:11a-23: dang rtogs pa che ba nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir
T03D3814:11a-24: / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o //
T03D3814:11a-25: phan tshun du 'brel pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3814:11a-26: drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i ched du brtson
T03D3814:11a-27: 'grus khyad par can dang ldan pa'i phyir go cha
T03D3814:11a-30: sbyin pa la sogs pa drug po re re la
T03D3814:11a-31: yang rnam pa drug po 'dus pa la go cha'i
T03D3814:11a-33: de ni rnam pa drug dang ldan pa ji skad du bstan pa'o //
T03D3814:11a-34: phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bstan te /
T03D3814:11a-35: go cha chen po nyid kyis bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:11a-36: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa med par ni
T03D3814:11a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams chen po nyid du
T03D3814:11a-38: mi rung ngo // nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
T03D3814:11a-39: mthun pa la sogs pa'i gnas skabs kyi phyir mi
T03D3814:11a-40: ldog pa la ni bya bar 'os pa ma yin
T03D3814:11a-41: mi rung ngo // no // de skad du /
T03D3814:11a-42: drod dang spyi bo bzod pa dang //
T03D3814:11b-0: chos @11b kyi mchog la gnas pa dag / rtags ni rnam pa nyi shu 'dis //
T03D3814:11b-1: byang chub dag las mi ldog yin //
T03D3814:11b-2: mi ldog pa yi rtags dag ni //
T03D3814:11b-3: mthong ba'i lam gnas yin par 'dod //
T03D3814:11b-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T03D3814:11b-5: skya rengs ni mang ste mthon ka dang /
T03D3814:11b-7: dmar po dang nyi ma'i mdog 'dra zer ba'o //
T03D3814:11b-8: 'dir dus la ma babs par 'ongs pas na rings pa yin par brjod par bzhed pa'i phyir /
T03D3814:11b-9: skya rengs mthon ka yin par blta bar bya ste /
T03D3814:11b-10: de ni thams cad pas sngar 'char ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3814:11b-11: khyad par med pas na thams cad bsdu ba byas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:11b-13: thog mar skar ma'i 'od nyams shing //
T03D3814:11b-14: nam mkha' dag ni sngo ser mdog / shar phyogs su ni mdog snga'o 'od //
T03D3814:11b-15: mthon ka'i skya rengs shar ba yin //
T03D3814:11b-16: de shar ba ni de byung ba'o //
T03D3814:11b-17: des mtshon pa'i dus la bab pa ni tshe ste /
T03D3814:11b-18: dus de la bab pa na de'i tshe mtshan mo thog ma rnga brdung ba'i dus so //
T03D3814:11b-20: gnas ni nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i khang pa la bya ste /
T03D3814:11b-22: ga la ba zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang mtshon pa'o //
T03D3814:11b-23: der zhes bya ba 'dis kyang song ba mtshon par byed do//
T03D3814:11b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan bshams pa'i phyogs kyi nye
T03D3814:11b-25: 'khor du 'dug par 'os pa'i gnas las phyi rol
T03D3814:11b-26: na 'dug pa'i phyir yul las 'das pa'o //
T03D3814:11b-27: yul dang dus las 'das pa 'di gnyis kyis bsam
T03D3814:11b-28: pa'i khyad par ston pa'i phyir 'chad pa'i gleng gzhi
T03D3814:11b-29: yin no // de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba la sogs pa ni ji skad du /
T03D3814:11b-30: rin po che'i za ma tog las bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi tog gis /
T03D3814:11b-31: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa dang /
T03D3814:11b-32: gang bcom ldan 'das chos la lta ba shin tu
T03D3814:11b-33: rnam par dag par gyur pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T03D3814:11b-34: pa la lta ba shin tu rnam par dag pa
T03D3814:11b-35: yin no // gang gi tshe lus kyis ma yin sems kyis ma yin /
T03D3814:11b-36: mi 'dud rab tu mi 'dud khengs par ma yin
T03D3814:11b-37: gus par ma yin par mi gnas par 'dug ste
T03D3814:11b-38: / btang snyoms thob cing rnam par dben pa'i regs kyis sems gnas te /
T03D3814:12a-1: ldan zhing shes bzhin du 'dug pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal ba yin no //
T03D3814:12a-2: gang gi tshe bdag tu sgro 'dogs par mi byed /
T03D3814:12a-3: sangs rgyas su sgro 'dogs par mi byed /
T03D3814:12a-4: mnyam pa nyid yin par mnyam par mi byed /
T03D3814:12a-5: mi mnyam pa nyid yin par mi mnyam par mi byed /
T03D3814:12a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig tu shin tu gcig par byed /
T03D3814:12a-8: sangs rgyas kyi sku yang chos kyi sku yin par rtogs /
T03D3814:12a-9: rang gi lus kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi nang du gtogs par mthong /
T03D3814:12a-10: mthong ba rnams kyang ma yin par ma mthong /
T03D3814:12a-13: nye bar ma yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
T03D3814:12a-14: pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin no zhes gsol
T03D3814:12a-15: to // de ltar na lta ba la sogs pa de dag ni rgyu yin no //
T03D3814:12a-16: sems can gyi don ni 'bras bu ste /
T03D3814:12a-17: de dag ni phyis bstan par bya'o //
T03D3814:12a-18: nyon mongs pa med cing kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sku tshe bstod pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3814:12a-19: tshe dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T03D3814:12a-20: sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa'i lta ba la sogs pa kun la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3814:12a-21: mngon du zhugs te mngon du zhugs te zhes rnam
T03D3814:12a-22: pa gnyis 'byung ba ni gsal ba gsal ba bzhin
T03D3814:12a-23: pa'am / 'jam po 'jam po zhes bya ba bzhin te /
T03D3814:12a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon du phyogs pa 'am
T03D3814:12a-25: bshad pa'i don la mngon du phyogs te zhugs pa
T03D3814:12a-26: ni gnas pa'i ched dam spyod pa'i ched du zhugs
T03D3814:12a-27: pa dang gnas so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste
T03D3814:12a-28: / lta ba la sogs pa bstan zin pa'i ngo
T03D3814:12a-29: bo de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du brtson
T03D3814:12a-30: / pa'i phyir ro // glegs bam kha cig las
T03D3814:12a-31: 'das shing thal te 'dus par mkhyen nas zhes 'byung
T03D3814:12a-32: ba zhes bya ba der yang yul dang dus las
T03D3814:12a-33: 'das te zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
T03D3814:12a-34: nyan thos sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa dag shes
T03D3814:12a-35: rab dang rdzu 'phrul la sogs pas chen po yin
T03D3814:12a-36: no // yang na nyan pas na nyan thos te /
T03D3814:12a-38: de dag ni mang ba'i phyir chen po nyid do //
T03D3814:12a-39: 'dus pa tshogs par mkhyen nas so //
T03D3814:12a-40: kyang zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i bcom
T03D3814:12b-0: ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa @12b gsum kho nar zad
T03D3814:12b-1: par 'dir nges par gzung ba'i don yin gyi /
T03D3814:12b-2: nyi khri lnga stong pa la sogs pa las ting
T03D3814:12b-3: nge 'dzin dang rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs
T03D3814:12b-4: pas gdul bya rnams gzud pa lta bur byas pa
T03D3814:12b-6: gdul bya'i sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin ba chung
T03D3814:12b-7: ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam
T03D3814:12b-8: par zhugs zin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:12b-9: yongs su smin pa'i rnam par zhugs zin pa de
T03D3814:12b-10: yang mngon du zhugs pa mngon du zhugs pa zhes
T03D3814:12b-11: bya ba'i tshig gis bstan to //
T03D3814:12b-12: kha cig gis phyi dang nang gi gnas phye nas /
T03D3814:12b-13: bgrod par bya ba gnyis su brtags te mngon du
T03D3814:12b-14: zhugs pa mngon du zhugs pa zhes bya ba byed
T03D3814:12b-15: pa'i tshig gnyis sbyor bar byed pa mi rigs par
T03D3814:12b-16: mthong ste / sgra dang don gnyis mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:12b-17: sha ra dva ti'i bu khyod ci'i phyir zhes bya
T03D3814:12b-18: ba la sogs pas ni sh'a ri'i bu dus dang
T03D3814:12b-20: 'ongs pa'i dgongs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dris pa
T03D3814:12b-21: ni thams cad pas thog mar 'phags pa 'jam dpal
T03D3814:12b-22: la 'ongs pa ni shin tu dgongs pa mchog dang
T03D3814:12b-23: ldan pa yod par 'khor rnams la bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3814:12b-24: ro // thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du 'jam
T03D3814:12b-25: dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'jam dpal
T03D3814:12b-26: ni ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3814:12b-27: blta ba la sogs pa ston par mkhas pa'i phyir
T03D3814:12b-28: ro // dang / thog mar 'ongs pa yang yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3814:12b-29: sh'a ri'i bus kyang de 'jam dpal lags so zhes smra'o //
T03D3814:12b-30: mkhyen bzhin du zhes bya ba ni rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3814:12b-31: chos kyi sku thob pa dang sangs rgyas nyid du
T03D3814:12b-32: zhugs pa'i 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang de ltar brtson
T03D3814:12b-33: par 'jug pa dang sbyar na nges par dgos pa

T03D3814:12b-35: de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la sogs pa la 'khor rnams kyi gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir /
T03D3814:12b-36: 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3814:12b-37: thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du pho brang gi
T03D3814:12b-38: sgor 'dug ces grag na bden nam zhes bka' stsal
T03D3814:12b-39: te / de nyid kyi phyir mi srid pa la
T03D3814:12b-40: grag na zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyor bar mdzad do
T03D3814:13a-0: te / // ci'i phyir khyod kho na lhag par brtson par byed @13a * //
T03D3814:13a-2: ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3814:13a-3: 'dis ni shin tu dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid bstan te /
T03D3814:13a-4: 'di ltar blta ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T03D3814:13a-5: bsnyen bkur bya ba 'ang 'dod pa mi ngoms te
T03D3814:13a-6: 'ongs pa ji skad du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams
T03D3814:13a-7: kyis ni dad pa dang brtson 'grus shin tu che

T03D3814:13a-9: dang phyag 'tshal bas ni dran pa dang ting nge
T03D3814:13a-10: 'dzin che ba nyid dang bsnyen bkur byed pas ni
T03D3814:13a-11: thams cad kyang che ba nyid yin par bstan to
T03D3814:13a-12: // blta ba la sogs pa la yang ci'i phyir khyod brtson pa nyid du byed ce na /
T03D3814:13a-13: 'di ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba
T03D3814:13a-14: nas bsnyen bkur bya ba'i slad du mchi ba de
T03D3814:13a-15: yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du

T03D3814:89a-10: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams
T03D3814:89a-11: cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs
T03D3814:89a-13: de de bzhin no zhes mngon par bstod do //
T03D3814:89a-14: kha cig ston pa po gzhan yang yod par 'chad do //
T03D3814:89a-15: de skad bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3814:89a-16: 'jam dpal gyis bka' stsal to zhes sbyor bar byed pa de dag ni /
T03D3814:89a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la /
T03D3814:89a-18: mngon par dga'o zhes gsungs pa'i phyir /
T03D3814:89a-20: mngon par dga' ba'o zhes sbyar ba bsal ba yin no //
T03D3814:89a-22: sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i tshig 'dres pa'i skyon du yang 'gyur ro //
T03D3814:89a-23: bcom ldan 'das chos 'chad pa ji snyed pa dang /
T03D3814:89a-24: 'brel par 'chad pa'i tshig de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus yin pas /
T03D3814:89a-25: brgya byin la sogs pa'i tshig kyang sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin par gzung bar bya'o //
T03D3814:89a-26: dri med tshig gi 'od zer yid 'ong tshogs rnams kyis //
T03D3814:89a-27: rgyal ba skyed ma rmongs pa'i dra ba sel mdzad pa'i //
T03D3814:89a-28: padma sdug po rjes su 'tsham par kha phye la //
T03D3814:89a-29: ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du blo dang ldan pas ltos //
T03D3814:89a-30: bdag gis bdun brgya pa ni rnam phye ba'i ;
T03D3814:89a-31: / bsod nams gang thob des ni 'gro ba kun //
T03D3814:89a-32: gnas ngan len dang mtshan mas bcings pa las //
T03D3814:89a-33: rnam grol sangs rgyas myur du 'grub par shog /'phags
T03D3814:89a-34: pa shes rab bdun brgya pa rgya cher 'grel pa
T03D3814:89a-35: / mgon po ngag gi dbang pos spobs pa bskyed
